title: Can someone fill me in on what runes are so cheap?
body: I can't find any official announcements on why Runes are so cheap. So, can someone tell me why? I heard a humor Riot was going to do away with runes, but couldn't find anything concrete beyond that.

replies.body: Runes aren't going away, but they are being changed to be even better come pre-season.  We have a[ Riot Pls](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/09/upcoming-changes-to-leveling-ip-rewards/) specifically about this, but basically the price was also reduced because IP will be converted into Blue Essence in addition to rune changes.  I hope that helps!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yq2i6RDmbNc&feature=youtu.be

They reduced them to 10ip since those that buy them after the price reduction won't get refunded for buying them.
If you don't absolutely need the runes, don't buy them.
The reduction was for newer accounts to help access ranked before the transition.
Runes & Masteries are being combined soon. And they are going to be free. See more on ask riot.
